sentence: The one issue everyone had that stayed or attended the event was the cost of parking
Well the bleak carport remains as does the empty foyer and fusty elevators
A bleak cement drive through on the ground floor leads to an empty foyer with old fashiony elevators going up to a bland and poorly designed lobby
He went above and beyond his way to not only call UPS to ask about the status of my package but also left me a message at my handphone when the package arrived while I was out for conference
One negative the hotel was hosting an event Saturday night so the bar was closed to patrons not cool need to give your clientele this info at check
An event was going on during our stay and since the event space is right off the main lobby it is hard to navigate around hordes of people that do not care that they are blocking the hallway
This totally disrupted my preparation for a meeting with an important client and a federal agency
I saw the largest roach that I have ever seen just marching through one the rooms that our conference was using
Just stopped into the Westin in between business meetings in the city
I hope they have the meeting here again next year
They did a great job supporting the meeting with meeting rooms lecture halls and catering
lobby bar got very crowded due to events in the hotel giving motivation to explore this great city
Was in town for one night for an early meeting
I did not stay here but came for a conference which was very well done except for parking of 35 a day in the public lot next to the hotel it was even more in the so called hotel lot
I made a last minute reservation for my daughter via a broker site for an event that night and I heard her wrong
I spent a few days at the Westin Hotel for a conference
I went to my meetings and when I returned at 4 the piles were there
